description: Submits a request to process a query statement. This operation generates work units that can be retrieved with the GetWorkUnits operation as soon as the query state is WORKUNITS_AVAILABLE or FINISHED.

parameters.name: QueryPlanningContext
parameters.description: A structure containing information about the query plan. CatalogId (string) --- The ID of the Data Catalog where the partition in question resides. If none is provided, the Amazon Web Services account ID is used by default. The database containing the table. QueryAsOfTime (datetime) --- The time as of when to read the table contents. If not set, the most recent transaction commit time will be used. Cannot be specified along with TransactionId. QueryParameters (dict) --- A map consisting of key-value pairs. (string) --- (string) --- TransactionId (string) --- The transaction ID at which to read the table contents. If this transaction is not committed, the read will be treated as part of that transaction and will see its writes. If this transaction has aborted, an error will be returned. If not set, defaults to the most recent committed transaction. Cannot be specified along with QueryAsOfTime.

nested_params.name: CatalogId
nested_params.description: The ID of the Data Catalog where the partition in question resides. If none is provided, the Amazon Web Services account ID is used by default.

nested_params.name: QueryAsOfTime
nested_params.description: The time as of when to read the table contents. If not set, the most recent transaction commit time will be used. Cannot be specified along with TransactionId.

nested_params.name: QueryParameters
nested_params.description: A map consisting of key-value pairs.

nested_params.name: TransactionId
nested_params.description: The transaction ID at which to read the table contents. If this transaction is not committed, the read will be treated as part of that transaction and will see its writes. If this transaction has aborted, an error will be returned. If not set, defaults to the most recent committed transaction. Cannot be specified along with QueryAsOfTime.

parameters.name: QueryString
parameters.description: A PartiQL query statement used as an input to the planner service.

nested_items.name: QueryId
nested_items.description: The ID of the plan query operation can be used to fetch the actual work unit descriptors that are produced as the result of the operation. The ID is also used to get the query state and as an input to the Execute operation.
